#summary What's coming in future releases

==Gears 0.3 (Q2 2008)==

*Highlights:*

  * Add [http://code.google.com/apis/gears/upcoming/api_desktop.html Desktop API]

  * Progress events for the managed resource store ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=30 tracking bug])

  * Add `getPermission()` method and `hasPermission` property to the Factory object to enable finer grained control for applications requesting access to Gears.

  * i18n for Gears UI ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=138 tracking bug])

  * i18n for Database full-text-search ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=153 tracking bug])

For all changes in this release, see [http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/list?q=Version:0.3&can=1&colspec=Version+Status+ID+Summary&sort=Status this query].
